Package shapes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArbitrarySimplePolygon
    A class to represent any arbitrary simple polygon.
    ArbitrarySimplePolygon.RotationBuilder
    An abstract class which adds a rotation argument to ShapeBuilder.
    Circle
    A class to represent any circle, a special case of an ellipse with equal width and height.
    Circle.Builder
    A builder class for a Circle.
    Ellipse
    A class to represent any ellipse.
    Ellipse.Builder
    A builder class for an Ellipse.
    OrientedPolygon
    An abstract class to represent any polygon with a base and height, i.e.
    OrientedPolygon.AngleBuilder
    An abstract class which adds a bottom left (with rotation of 0) angle argument to HeightBuilder.
    OrientedPolygon.BaseBuilder
    An abstract class which adds a base length argument to RotationBuilder.
    OrientedPolygon.HeightBuilder
    An abstract class which adds a height argument to BaseBuilder.
    OrientedPolygon.OffsetBuilder
    An abstract class which adds a top edge offset from the base argument to HeightBuilder.
    Parallelogram
    A class to represent a parallelogram: a quadrilateral with two pairs of parallel lines.
    Parallelogram.AngleBuilder
    A builder class for a Parallelogram using an angle.
    Parallelogram.OffsetBuilder
    A builder class for a Parallelogram using an offset.
    ReadOnlyIterator<E>
    A class which provides an Iterator that can only be read from.
    Rectangle
    A class to represent a rectangle: a parallelogram with 90 degree internal angles.
    Rectangle.Builder
    A builder class for a Rectangle.
    Rhombus
    A class to represent a rhombus: a parallelogram with equal side lengths.
    Rhombus.Builder
    A builder class for a Rhombus.
    Shape
    A class to represent any shape to be used in the geometry drawer.
    ShapeBuilder
    A class which represents a builder for a Shape.
    ShapeBuilder.Arg
    An immutable class to represent a ShapeBuilder argument.
    ShapeFactory
    A class containing a mapping of all ShapeBuilders and variations of builders.
    Square
    A class to represent a square: a rectangle with equal side lengths.
    Square.Builder
    A builder class for a Square.
    Trapezoid
    A class to represent a trapezoid: a quadrilateral with at least one pair of parallel lines.
    Trapezoid.AngleBuilder
    A builder class for a Trapezoid using an angle.
    Trapezoid.OffsetBuilder
    A builder class for a Trapezoid using an offset.
    Triangle
    A class to represent a polygon with 3 sides.
    Triangle.SasBuilder
    A builder class for a Triangle, using Side-Angle-Side.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidShapeException
    A RuntimeException indicating that some input created a Shape that is not valid.
    NonPositiveDimensionException
    A RuntimeException indicating that a non-positive (negative or zero) value was provided as a dimension, which is not valid.
